1. Generation of private key and csr with the following format

origin url https://helpdesk.bioaster.org/front/knowbaseitem.form.php?id=73

CSR Nom de domaine (Common Name): *.bioaster.org Organisation (O): BIOASTER Unité d'organisation (OU): IS-IT Ville (L): LYON Etat ou Région (ST): Rhone-Alpes Pays (C): FR Key Size: 2048

1.1 Generate your private key first.

openssl genrsa -out service-name.bioaster.org.key 2048

1.2 Generate your csr with the private key

openssl req -new -key service-name.bioaster.org.key -out service-name.bioaster.org.csr

2. Send the csr to IT/IS via https://helpdesk.bioaster.org.

They will send you back the signed certificate and the intermediate certification (trust chain)
